thread.section_title: Wiggle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle.com | www.wiggle.com | 2 of 89
thread.title: Dane Savcic

author: Dane Savcic
title: Dane Savcic
text:
Paid for express delivery (within 3 working days). After a week (and many emails and chats) they finally admit they (not the postage) lost my package.
They back-ordered, simply leaving out one item. Back order also shipped using classic (non-priority) shipment. Instead of paid 3 working days delivery I'll be waiting in the range of 20. Like ordering from China, just more expensive.
